text: European Youth Olympic Festival (also European Youth Olympic Days) is a multi- sport event held in both summer and winter disciplines every second year. Speed skating is one of the sports in its winter edition. The competition is held in junior category. == Medalists == === Junior ladies === {| class="wikitable" ! colspan=6 align=center |500 metres |- ! Year !
